author: niallp
msg: Fix for BEANUTILS-249 - BeanUtilsBean does not convert objects using custom convertors properly - thanks to Brad

author: lresende
msg: Properly closing database connections and statements

author: jonesde
msg: Some improvements to the example component, and added an exampleext component which extends the example webapp to demonstrate extension and overide mechanisms; note that this works except for menu extension which doesn't appear to be working on the framework level

author: niallp
msg: BEANUTILS-258 - add new convert() and lookup() methods to ConvertUtils that utilize the capabilities of the improved Converter implementations. Also modify BeanUtils to use the new methods.

author: jonesde
msg: Small improvements to include alt-target, actions and row-actions for extended forms; also change to not try to get from a GenericEntity if it isn't a field of that entity, avoids lots of warning messages
